content.p: Welcome to our department Follow us on LinkedIn This is the place that engineers a sustainable future. We develop exceptional civil engineers who design and build the places of tomorrow. Imagine the possibilities of structures, geotechnics, materials and fluids. Immerse yourself in surveying, construction management and more. From career-advancing courses to our leading research, civil engineers build sustainable communities, improve people’s lives and help make a greener planet spin a little smoother. Get ready to shape the real world. Explore Civil Engineering facilities Learn about pioneering research for a sustainable future Where are Civil Engineering graduates now? View contact details, expertise and publications "What I enjoyed most was how the modules were structured to be applicable and practicable. My lecturers were friendly and welcoming." — Sunday Imosemi, Civil Engineering MSc graduate
